parameters.name: audio_name

param_schema.title: Audio Name
param_schema.description: Name of the dataset. The output will be a zip file containing a folder named `dataset/<audio_name>/`. This folder will include multiple `.mp3` files named as `split_<i>.mp3`. Each `split_<i>.mp3` file is a short audio clip extracted from the provided YouTube video, where voice has been isolated from the background noise.

parameters.description: Name of the dataset. The output will be a zip file containing a folder named `dataset/<audio_name>/`. This folder will include multiple `.mp3` files named as `split_<i>.mp3`. Each `split_<i>.mp3` file is a short audio clip extracted from the provided YouTube video, where voice has been isolated from the background noise.

parameters.name: youtube_url

param_schema.title: Youtube Url
param_schema.description: URL to YouTube video you'd like to create your RVC v2 dataset from
